briefTitle: A Confirmatory Trial of ETC-1002 in Patients With Hyper-LDL Cholesterolemia
officialTitle: A Placebo-controlled, Randomized, Multicenter, Double-blind, Parallel-group Trial to Confirm the Superiority of ETC-1002 in Patients With Hyper-LDL Cholesterolemia
summary: The purpose of this study is to confirm the superiority of ETC-1002 after 12 weeks of administration at 180 mg/day to placebo in patients with hyper-LDL cholesterolemia who have inadequate control of low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL C).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change in LDL-C From Baseline to Week 12
